actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide special pay and incentive pay for certain physicians and dentists employed by the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration in order to enhance the recruitment and retention of such personnel.
short_title: Veterans' Administration Physicians and Dentists Comparability Pay Act

summary.text: Veterans' Administration Physicians and Dentists Comparability Pay Act - Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to offer special pay and incentive pay to physicians and dentists employed on a full-time basis by the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration.

titles.title: Veterans' Administration Physicians and Dentists Comparability Pay Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide special pay and incentive pay for certain physicians and dentists employed by the Department of Medicine and Surgery of the Veterans' Administration in order to enhance the recruitment and retention of such personnel.
